founder.name: Amélie Renaud
founder.title: Founder & Creative Director
story: AMARISÉ was born from a quiet rebellion—a belief that true luxury exists not in logos or excess, but in the ritual of thoughtful living.
After two decades within the ateliers of Paris and Milan, I founded AMARISÉ in 2019 with a singular vision: to create objects worthy of becoming part of your story.
Each piece we craft represents a conversation between heritage and innovation, between the maker's hand and the wearer's life. We do not chase trends. We pursue permanence.
The name AMARISÉ—from the French 'amarrer,' to moor or anchor—reflects our philosophy. In a world of constant motion, we create anchors of beauty and meaning.
founder.philosophy: I believe the future of luxury is not more, but better. Not louder, but more resonant. Not faster, but more intentional.

values.title: Intentionality
values.description: Every decision, from material selection to final stitch, is made with purpose. We do not create by accident.

values.title: Timelessness
values.description: We design for decades, not seasons. Each piece is meant to become more beautiful with time and use.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We believe you have the right to know the story of everything you own—its origins, its makers, its impact.

values.title: Restraint
values.description: True luxury whispers. We embrace simplicity, allowing quality to speak for itself.

Lifestyle collection debuts with Murano artisans

craft.introduction: At AMARISÉ, craft is not a marketing word—it is the foundation of everything we create. Each piece passes through trained hands, following processes refined over generations.

processes.title: Hand-Finishing
processes.description: Every seam, every edge, every detail is completed by hand. Machines assist; artisans perfect.

processes.title: Material Selection
processes.description: We source from fewer than twelve partners worldwide, each chosen for their commitment to quality over quantity.

processes.title: Quality Control
processes.description: A single piece may pass through seventeen quality checkpoints before reaching you. Nothing leaves our atelier that we would not keep ourselves.

provenance.introduction: Every AMARISÉ piece carries a story of origin. We trace our materials to their source because transparency is not a feature—it is a responsibility.
